revision.text:
'''Ravoons''' are a family of aquatic enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They resemble large Sea dragons, and can be found throughout the [[Erythia Sea]].
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Ugend Ravoon]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Levialord Empireo]] ([[Superboss]])
{{clr}}
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == There is only one Ravoon enemy in {{XC3FR|sub}}. * [[Thunderfish Duna-Roa]] ([[Superboss]])
== Gallery == <gallery> XC3 Levialord Empireo.png|Levialord Empireo thunderfishDunaRoa.jpg|Thunderfish Duna-Roa </gallery>
{{xc3 stub}}
[[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Ravoons]] [[Category:XC3 Aquatic Life]] [[Category:XC3FR Species]] [[Category:XC3FR Ravoons]] [[Category:XC3FR Aquatic Life]] [[Category:Ravoons]] [[Category:Species by Type]]

{{For|the gem in {{XC}}|Recovery Up (XC1)}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Recovery Up |image = XC3 Recovery Up.png |caption = Boosts amount of HP healed. |type = Buff |base-duration = 20.0s |max-duration = 40.0s |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Base Recovery Boost |effect-value-1 = 50% }} '''Recovery Up''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It increases the HP healed whenever the affected character uses Arts or skills with healing effects.
==Distribution== ''The playable party has no means of attaining the buff outside of random methods. Though numerous skills and accessories replicate its effects, they are not listed here since they do not provide the buff.''
===Enemy-only Arts=== *Physical Boost ([[Keves Forces]] healers) *Battle Assist ([[Agnus Forces]] healers)
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{fr stub}}

{{spoiler}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Reduce All |caption = Reduces Dmg. / Acc. / Evas. / Def. |image = File:XC3 Reduce All.png |type = Debuff | attribute = Ether | base-duration = 60.0s | max-duration = 60.0s | rng-applicable = No | effect-title-1 = Base Attack Decrease | effect-value-1 = 30% | effect-title-2 = Base Defense Decrease | effect-value-2 = 50% | effect-title-3 = Base Accuracy/Evasion Decrease | effect-value-3 = 30% | effect-title-4 = Remarks | effect-value-4 = Debuff always succeeds, bypassing enemy resistances and immunities. Cannot be cleansed. }} '''Reduce All''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}}. It reduces the affected character's attack, defense, accuracy and evasion, greatly weakening them.
The debuff can only be inflicted through the use of the [[Origin Blade]] [[Talent Art]]. This Talent Art can be accessed by [[Noah]]'s [[Ouroboros]] when he Interlinks while [[Unlimited Sword]] is active, or when Interlinking at level 3 after unlocking Unlimited Sword, in which case the Talent Art is only available when the Ouroboros is close to overheating. [[Category:XC3 Status]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Refined Blessing | image = Gem-healer.png | effect = [Passive] Extends duration of buff effects issued by self by ''(value)%''. | category = Healer | max = 50% }} '''Refined Blessing''' is a Healer [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Buff Boost Duration |- !I |25% |- !II |27% |- !III |30% |- !IV |33% |- !V |35% |- !VI |37% |- !VII |40% |- !VIII |42% |- !IX |45% |- !X |50% |} == List of Gems == At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. If the required item/s is/are missing, the party can instead exchange [[Nopon Coin (Gold)|Gold Nopon Coins]] to craft the gem without having to consume any of the required items. {| class="xc1 sortable centered" width=100% !Name!!Ingredients!!Rarity!!Coin Cost |- | Refined Blessing I |[[Gemstone]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Refined Incantation | image = Gem-attacker.png | effect = [Passive] Extends duration timers of debuffs applied to enemies by ''(value)%''. | category = Attacker | max=50% }} '''Refined Incantation''' is an Attacker [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" ! !Debuff Timer Extension |- !I |25% |- !II |27% |- !III |30% |- !IV |33% |- !V |35% |- !VI |37% |- !VII |40% |- !VIII |42% |- !IX |45% |- !X |50% |} == List of Recipes== At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. {{For|the buff in {{XC}}|Regenerate (XC1)}} {{Spoiler}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Regenerate |caption = Heals HP at fixed intervals. |image = XC3 Regenerate.png |type = Buff |base-duration = 30.0s |max-duration = 60.0s |rng-applicable = No |effect-title-1 = Base Healing Amount (per tick) |effect-value-1 = 1.5% of character's max HP (player's party)
0.25% of character's max HP (enemies) |effect-title-2 = Tick Duration |effect-value-2 = 1.5s }} '''Regenerate''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It periodically heals the affected character over time. == Distribution == === Arts === * [[Autumn Rain]] ([[Troubadour]]) * [[Sweet Breeze]] ([[Miyabi]]) * [[Fleeting Form]] ([[Taion]]'s [[Ouroboros]]) * [[Bullet Hail]] ([[Valdi]]'s [[Chain Attack (XC3)|Chain Order]]) === Field Effects === There are four distinct versions of fields with Regenerate effects, each with different parameters based on the field setter's Healing Power (as opposed to the affected character's HP) and tick duration. They are grouped by parameter values. ==== 100% of Healing Power every 2.0s ==== * [[Pride of Place]] ([[Lapidarist]]; also has [[Blaze (XC3)|Blaze]] effect) ==== 100% of Healing Power every 3.0s ==== * [[Healing Ring]] ([[Medic Gunner]]) ==== 75% of Healing Power every 3.0s ==== * [[Waterlily]] ([[Lifesage]]) * [[Redeeming Bloom]] ([[Nia]]) ==== 50% of Healing Power every 2.0s ==== * [[Moondog]] ([[Strategos]]) * [[Heal Harmony]] ([[Signifer]]) * [[Life Plant]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Gorgeous Mandora]]) * [[Power Raiser]] ([[Noah]], [[Unlimited Sword]] in a [[Healer]] role) * [[Gyreflow]] ([[Isurd]]) * [[Unbreakable Heart]] ([[Fiona]]) [[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]] {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}
